aiHub.title: AI Hub
aiHub.description: Access powerful AI tools for real estate professionals

forms.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
forms.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

messages.welcome: Welcome to Empower AI South America
messages.goodbye: Thank you for using our platform
messages.contactSupport: Contact support if the problem persists

actionAI.description: Generate personalized daily action plans with AI-powered scripts and strategies. Focus your prospecting efforts and maximize your productivity with targeted outreach plans.
actionAI.targetedProspectingDesc: Focus your outreach on specific audience segments
actionAI.readyScriptsDesc: Get professionally written scripts for calls, texts, and emails
actionAI.dailyPlansDesc: Receive a structured plan with specific tasks and goals
actionAI.generatorDesc: Tell us who you want to prospect today, and we'll create a complete action plan with scripts
actionAI.saveTimeDesc: Eliminate the guesswork and planning time. Get a complete, ready-to-execute action plan in seconds instead of spending hours creating one yourself.
actionAI.increaseEffectivenessDesc: Use professionally crafted scripts that incorporate VAK language principles to connect with all personality types and increase your response rates.
actionAI.stayFocusedDesc: Maintain clarity on your daily priorities with a structured plan that keeps you accountable and focused on high-value prospecting activities.
actionAI.trackProgressDesc: Set clear, measurable goals for your daily outreach efforts. Know exactly how many calls, texts, and emails to send to hit your targets.
actionAI.step1Desc: Tell us who you want to talk to today. Be specific about your target audience, such as "FSBO listings in the downtown area" or "Past clients from 2-3 years ago."
actionAI.step2Desc: Enter your name, email, and any specific goals or challenges you're facing with this audience.
actionAI.step3Desc: Our AI coach generates a complete daily action plan with specific tasks, goals, and professionally written scripts for calls, texts, and emails.
actionAI.step4Desc: Follow your personalized plan throughout the day, tracking your progress and results to improve future prospecting efforts.
